import { Link, useParams } from "react-router-dom"; export default function Single({price, address, image, name, posted, user}){ const {id} = useParams() return( <>
{name == null ? "Ngong Hills Hotel" : name}
1450 Sq.Ft.
x3       x4
{address == null ? "Ngong Road, Nairobi" : address}
KES. {price == null ?"5,000" : price}
by {user == null ?"Hot'ale Managements": user}
{name == null? "Explore More" : "Order"}
) }
